results.title: Simvastatin nanoliposome induces myocardial and hepatic toxicities due to its absorption enhancement in mice
results.text_hl: Results demonstrated that compared to free @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@, the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@-Lipo administrated at an equal dose of 25 mg/kg/d led to severe myocardiotoxicity, hepatotoxicity at baseline and more pronounced @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver injury@@@ with elevation of @GENE_GPT @GENE_76282 @@@alanine aminotransferase@@@.

results.title: [Statin-related drug-induced liver injury].
results.journal: Zhonghua Gan Zang Bing Za Zhi
results.text_hl: A common side effect of statin use is a mild rise in liver aminotransferases, which occurs in less than 3% of patients. Statin-related @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver injury@@@ is most commonly caused by @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, but severe @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver injury@@@ is uncommon.

citations.NLM: Li XY, Zhong W, Mao YM. [Statin-related drug-induced liver injury]. Zhonghua Gan Zang Bing Za Zhi. 2023 Jun 20;31(6):659-663. PMID: 37400395
citations.BibTeX: @article{37400395, title={[Statin-related drug-induced liver injury].}, author={Li XY and Zhong W and Mao YM}, journal={Zhonghua Gan Zang Bing Za Zhi}, volume={31}, number={6}, pages={659-663}}

results.title: Severe Liver Injury Associated With High-Dose Atorvastatin Therapy
results.journal: J Investig Med High Impact Case Rep
results.text_hl: We report a case of severe, asymptomatic @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver injury@@@ in a hepatocellular pattern in a 71-year-old man occurring within 3 months of switching from @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to high-intensity @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ therapy.

results.title: A case of statin-induced liver injury with positive rechallenge with a second statin. Is there a class effect?
results.text_hl: CASE PRESENTATION: We describe a case of a middle-aged @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ who developed @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@hepatocellular liver injury@@@ after @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ dose escalation; a rechallenge with low dose @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ caused rapid recurrence of @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@DILI@@@.

citations.NLM: Onfiani G, Nascimbeni F, Carubbi F. A case of statin-induced liver injury with positive rechallenge with a second statin. Is there a class effect? J Basic Clin Physiol Pharmacol. 2021 Apr 22;32(6):1151-1155. PMID: 33882199
